title: Matplotlib Game: Pong
description: In this lab, you will learn how to create an interactive game of Pong using Matplotlib. Pong is a classic arcade game that involves two players hitting a ball back and forth across a virtual playing field using paddles. This lab will guide you through the process of building your own Pong game using Python and Matplotlib.
